items.name: Data Source Identifier
items.comment: Identification of the system sending the data

items.name: Service Identification
items.comment: Identification of the service provided to one or more users.

items.name: Track Number
items.comment: Identification of a track

items.name: Track Mode 3/A Code
items.comment: Mode-3/A code converted into octal representation.

items.name: CH
items.comment:
Change in Mode 3/A
0 No Change
1 Mode 3/A has changed

items.name: Time Of Track Information
items.comment: Absolute time stamping of the information provided in the track message, in the form of elapsed time since last midnight, expressed as UTC.

items.name: Track Status
items.comment: Status of a track.

items.name: MON
items.comment:
0 Multisensor track
1 Monosensor track

items.name: SPI
items.comment:
0 default value
1 SPI present in the last report received from a sensor capable of decoding this data

items.name: MRH
items.comment:
Most Reliable Height
0 Barometric altitude (Mode C) more reliable
1 Geometric altitude more reliable

items.name: SRC
items.comment:
Source of calculated track altitude for I062/130
0 no source
1 GNSS
2 3D radar
3 triangulation
4 height from coverage
5 speed look-up table
6 default height
7 multilateration

items.name: CNF
items.comment:
0 Confirmed track
1 Tentative track

items.name: SIM
items.comment:
0 Actual track
1 Simulated track

items.name: TSE
items.comment:
0 default value
1 last message transmitted to the user for the track

items.name: TSB
items.comment:
0 default value
1 first message transmitted to the user for the track

items.name: FPC
items.comment:
0 Not flight-plan correlated
1 Flight plan correlated

items.name: AFF
items.comment:
0 default value
1 ADS-B data inconsistent with other surveillance information

items.name: STP
items.comment:
0 default value
1 Slave Track Promotion

items.name: KOS
items.comment:
0 Complementary service used
1 Background service used

items.name: AMA
items.comment:
0 track not resulting from amalgamation process
1 track resulting from amalgamation process

items.name: MD4
items.comment:
0 No Mode 4 interrogation
1 Friendly target
2 Unknown target
3 No reply

items.name: ME
items.comment:
0 default value
1 Military Emergency present in the last report received from a sensor capable of decoding this data

items.name: MI
items.comment:
0 default value
1 Military Identification present in the last report received from a sensor capable of decoding this data

items.name: MD5
items.comment:
0 No Mode 5 interrogation
1 Friendly target
2 Unknown target
3 No reply

items.name: CST
items.comment:
0 Default value
1 Age of the last received track update is higher than system dependent threshold (coasting)

items.name: PSR
items.comment:
0 Default value
1 Age of the last received PSR track update is higher than system dependent threshold

items.name: SSR
items.comment:
0 Default value
1 Age of the last received SSR track update is higher than system dependent threshold

items.name: MDS
items.comment:
0 Default value
1 Age of the last received Mode S track update is higher than system dependent threshold

items.name: ADS
items.comment:
0 Default value
1 Age of the last received ADS-B track update is higher than system dependent threshold

items.name: SUC
items.comment:
0 Default value
1 Special Used Code (Mode A codes to be defined in the system to mark a track with special interest)

items.name: AAC
items.comment:
0 Default value
1 Assigned Mode A Code Conflict (same discrete Mode A Code assigned to another track)
